sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_9e75b5e09f331200598a5bb0657fcf19
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.PmProjectStatusReport</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Status Report API</description><name>PmProjectStatusReport</name><script><![CDATA[var PmProjectStatusReport = Class.create();
PmProjectStatusReport.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    projectRecord: function(sysId, projectTable) {
        //gs.info("Into projectRecord: " + sysId + " - " + projectTable);
        var gr;
        if(JSUtil.notNil(projectTable)) {
            gr = new GlideRecord(projectTable); // for Teamspaces
        } else {
            gr = new GlideRecord("pm_project");
        }
        gr.get(sysId);
        return gr;
    },

    getIcon: function(value) {
        if ( value == 'green'||'on_schedule'||'complete')
            return 'fa-check-circle';
        else if ( value == 'yellow'||'at_risk' )
            return 'fa-minus-circle';
        else
            return 'fa-exclamation-circle';
    },

    headerInfoPlain: function(sysId) {
        //gs.info("Into headerInfo: " + sysId);
        var gr = this.projectRecord(sysId);
        return {
            short_description: gr.getValue("short_description"),
            number: gr.getValue("number"),
            project_manager_label: gs.getMessage("Project Manager"),
            project_manager_value: gr.getDisplayValue("project_manager"),
            portfolio_label: gs.getMessage("Portfolio"),
            portfolio_value: gr.getDisplayValue("primary_portfolio"),
			program_label: gs.getMessage("Program"),
			program_value: gr.getDisplayValue("primary_program"),
            start_date_label: gs.getMessage("Planned Start Date"),
            start_date_value: gr.getDisplayValue("start_date"),
            work_start_label: gs.getMessage("Actual Start Date"),
            work_start_value: gr.getDisplayValue("work_start"),
            work_end_exists: JSUtil.notNil(gr.getValue("work_end")),
            work_end_label: gs.getMessage("Actual End Date"),
            work_end_value: gr.getDisplayValue("work_end"),
            end_date_label: gs.getMessage("Planned End Date"),
            end_date_value: gr.getDisplayValue("end_date"),
            percent_complete_label: gs.getMessage("% Complete"),
            percent_complete_value: gr.getDisplayValue("percent_complete"),
            state_label: gs.getMessage("State"),
            state_value: gr.getDisplayValue("state")
        };
    },

    allProjectStatus: function(sysId) {
        var projectStatus = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord("project_status");
        gr.addQuery("project", sysId);
        gr.orderByDesc("as_on");
        gr.query();
        //gs.info("statusRecordCount: " + gr.getRowCount() + " -- " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
        while(gr.next()) {
            projectStatus.push({
                sys_id: gr.getValue("sys_id"),
                label: gr.getDisplayValue("as_on"),
                value: gr.getValue("as_on"),
                selected: false
            });
        }
        if(projectStatus.length > 0) {
            projectStatus[0].selected = true;
        } else {
            projectStatus.push({
                sys_id: -1,
                label: gs.getMessage("None"),
                value: "none",
                selected: true
            });
        }
        return projectStatus;
    },

    weeksInfo: function(sysId) {
        //gs.info("Into weeksInfo: " + sysId);
        var gr = this.projectRecord(sysId);
        var startDate = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("start_date"));
        var endDate = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("end_date"));
        var startWeek = startDate.getWeekOfYearLocalTime();
        var endWeek = endDate.getWeekOfYearLocalTime();
        var weeks = [];
        for (var i = startWeek; i <= endWeek; i++) {
            weeks.push({
                number: i,
                name: gs.getMessage("Week {0}", i),
                selected: (i==startWeek)
            });
        }
        return {
            name: gr.getValue("short_description"),
            start_date: startDate.getDisplayValue(),
            end_date: endDate.getDisplayValue(),
            start_week: startWeek,
            end_week: endWeek,
            weeks: weeks
        };
    },

    statusInfo: function(sysId) {
        //gs.info("Into weeksInfo: " + sysId);
        var gr = this.projectRecord(sysId);
        var allProjectStatus = this.allProjectStatus(sysId);
        return {
            name: gr.getValue("short_description"),
            choices: allProjectStatus,
            init_value: allProjectStatus[0].value
        };
    },

    otherStatus: function(statusRecord) {
        //gs.info("Into overallStatus: " + statusRecord.getValue("sys_id"));
        return this.otherStatusSummary(statusRecord);
    },

    otherStatusSummary: function(gr) {
        var otherStatus = [];
        otherStatus.push({
            order: 1,
            label: gs.getMessage("Overall"),
            value: gr.getDisplayValue("overall_health"),
            internal_value: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("overall_health")),
            comments: gr.getValue("comments"),
            icon: this.getIcon(gr.getValue("overall_health"))
        });
        otherStatus.push({
            order: 2,
            label: gs.getMessage("Schedule"),
            value: gr.getDisplayValue("schedule"),
            internal_value: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("schedule")),
            comments: gr.getValue("schedule_comments"),
            icon: this.getIcon(gr.getValue("schedule"))
        });
        otherStatus.push({
            order: 3,
            label: gs.getMessage("Cost"),
            value: gr.getDisplayValue("cost"),
            internal_value: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("cost")),
            comments: gr.getValue("cost_comments"),
            icon: this.getIcon(gr.getValue("cost"))
        });
        otherStatus.push({
            order: 4,
            label: gs.getMessage("Resources"),
            value: gr.getDisplayValue("resources"),
            internal_value: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("resources")),
            comments: gr.getValue("resources_comments"),
            icon: this.getIcon(gr.getValue("resources"))
        });
        otherStatus.push({
            order: 5,
            label: gs.getMessage("Scope"),
            value: gr.getDisplayValue("scope"),
            internal_value: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("scope")),
            comments: gr.getValue("scope_comments"),
            icon: this.getIcon(gr.getValue("scope"))
        });
        return { displayFields: otherStatus };
    },

    statusByReportName: function(reportName, sysId, weekDate) {
        var allStatus = [];
        var gr = this.getProjectStatus(sysId, weekDate);
        return this[reportName](gr);
    },

    getProjectStatus: function(sysId, weekDate) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord("project_status");
        gr.addQuery("project", sysId);
        if(JSUtil.notNil(weekDate))
            gr.addQuery("as_on", "<=", weekDate);
        else 
            gr.addQuery("as_on", "<=", (new GlideDateTime()).getValue());
        gr.orderByDesc("as_on");
        gr.query();
        //gs.info("statusRecordCount: " + gr.getRowCount() + " -- " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
        if(gr.next()) {
            return gr;
        }
    },

    getProjectStatusBySysId: function(sysId) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord("project_status");
        gr.get(sysId);
        return gr;
    },

    overallStatus: function(statusRecord) {
        //gs.info("Into overallStatus: " + statusRecord.getValue("sys_id"));
        var overallStatus = {
            label: gs.getMessage("Overall Status"),
            displayFields: []
        };
        if(JSUtil.notNil(statusRecord) && statusRecord.isValidRecord()) {
            overallStatus.displayFields.push({
                order: 1,
                label: gs.getMessage("Executive Summary"),
                value: statusRecord.getValue("executive_summary")
            });
            overallStatus.displayFields.push({
                order: 2,
                label: gs.getMessage("Achievements Last Week"),
                value: statusRecord.getValue("achievements_last_week")
            });
            overallStatus.displayFields.push({
                order: 3,
                label: gs.getMessage("Key Activities planned for next week"),
                value: statusRecord.getValue("key_activities_next_week")
            });
			overallStatus.displayFields.push({
				order: 4,
				label: gs.getMessage("This Week"),
				value: statusRecord.getValue("u_this_week")
			});
            /*overallStatus.displayFields.push({
                order: 4,
                label: gs.getMessage("Status"),
                value: statusRecord.getDisplayValue("overall_health"),
                internal_value: statusRecord.getValue("overall_health")
            });*/
        }
        return overallStatus;
    },

    getColorValue: function(colorValue) {
        if(JSUtil.nil(colorValue))
            return "white";
        return colorValue;
    },

    getWeekValue: function(dateValue) {
        var date = new GlideDateTime(dateValue);
        var week = date.getWeekOfYearLocalTime();
        return week;
    },

    statusValues: function(sysId, startDate, endDate) {
        //gs.info("Into statusValues: " + sysId);
        var statusValues = {};
        var projectGr = this.projectRecord(sysId);
        var gr = new GlideRecord("project_status");
        gr.addQuery("project", sysId);
        if(JSUtil.notNil(startDate))
            gr.addQuery("as_on", ">=", startDate);
        if(JSUtil.notNil(endDate))
            gr.addQuery("as_on", "<=", endDate);
        else
            gr.addQuery("as_on", "<=", (new GlideDateTime()).getValue());
        gr.query();
        //gs.info("statusRecordCount: " + gr.getRowCount() + " -- " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
        while(gr.next()) {
            var week = this.getWeekValue(gr.getValue("as_on"));
            statusValues[week] = {  overall:  this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("overall_health")),
                                    schedule: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("schedule")),
                                    cost: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("cost")),
                                    resources: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("resources")),
                                    scope: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("scope")),
                                };
        }
        //gs.info("statusValues: " + (new JSON()).encode(statusValues));
        return statusValues;
    },
    
    getStatuses: function(projectId, endDate, limit) {
        var projectStatus = [], orderedStatus = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord("project_status");
        gr.addQuery("project", projectId);
        if(JSUtil.notNil(endDate))
            gr.addQuery("as_on", "<=", endDate);
        else
            gr.addQuery("as_on", "<=", (new GlideDateTime()).getValue());
        gr.setLimit(limit);
        gr.orderByDesc("as_on");
        gr.query();
        //gs.info("statusRecordCount: " + gr.getRowCount() + " -- " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
        while(gr.next()) {           
            projectStatus.push({overall:  this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("overall_health")),
                                comments: gr.getValue("comments"),
                                schedule: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("schedule")),
                                schedule_comments: gr.getValue("schedule_comments"),
                                cost: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("cost")),
                                cost_comments: gr.getValue("cost_comments"),
                                resources: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("resources")),
                                resources_comments: gr.getValue("resources_comments"),
                                scope: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("scope")),
                                scope_comments: gr.getValue("scope_comments"),
                                date: gr.getValue("as_on")
                                });
        }
        return projectStatus;
    },

    getStatusesFromLastReport: function(lastReportId, limit) {
        //gs.info("Into getStatusesFromLastReport: " + lastReportId + " -- " + limit);
        var lastProjectStatus = this.getProjectStatusBySysId(lastReportId);
        var projectId = lastProjectStatus.getValue("project");
        var endDate = lastProjectStatus.getValue("as_on");
        var projectStatus = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord("project_status");
        gr.addQuery("project", projectId);
        if(JSUtil.notNil(endDate))
            gr.addQuery("as_on", "<=", endDate);
        else
            gr.addQuery("as_on", "<=", (new GlideDateTime()).getValue());
        gr.setLimit(limit || 10);
        gr.orderBy("as_on");
        gr.query();
        //gs.info("statusRecordCount: " + gr.getRowCount() + " -- " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
        while(gr.next()) {           
            projectStatus.push({overall:  this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("overall_health")),
                                schedule: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("schedule")),
                                cost: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("cost")),
                                resources: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("resources")),
                                scope: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("scope")),
                                date: gr.getValue("as_on")
                                });
        }
        return projectStatus;
    },

    statusReport: function(sysId, startDate, endDate) {
        //gs.info("Into statusReport: " + sysId);
        var statusReport = {};
        // high chart plots on the based on the index of the category
        statusReport['yAxis'] = {
            categories: [ gs.getMessage('Scope'), gs.getMessage('Resource'), 
                            gs.getMessage('Cost'),  gs.getMessage('Schedule'), 
                            gs.getMessage('Overall') 
                            ],
            title: null
        };

        var weeksInfo = this.weeksInfo(sysId);
        var startWeek = weeksInfo.start_week;
        var weeks = weeksInfo.weeks;
        var statusValues = this.statusValues(sysId, startDate, endDate);
        var xAxisCategories = [];
        for (var i = 0; i < weeks.length; i++) {
            xAxisCategories.push(weeks[i].name);
        }

        statusReport['xAxis'] = {
            categories: xAxisCategories
        }

        // now re-map the start week to zero index
        var data = [];
        for (var i = 0; i < weeks.length; i++) {
            var week = weeks[i].number;
            var statusValue = statusValues[week];
            var valueArray = ['scope', 'resources', 'cost', 'schedule', 'overall'];
            for (var j = 0; j < valueArray.length; j++) {
                var color = "white";
                if(JSUtil.notNil(statusValue))
                    color = statusValue[valueArray[j]];
                data.push({
                            x: i,
                            y: j,
                            color: color
                        });
            }
        }
        statusReport['data'] = data;
        return statusReport;
    },

    fiscalPeriodsForIds: function(fiscalPeriodIds) {
        //gs.info("Into fiscalPeriodsForIds: " + fiscalPeriodIds.join(','));
        var fiscalPeriodsArray = [];
        var fiscalPeriods = new GlideRecord("fiscal_period");
        fiscalPeriods.addQuery("sys_id", "IN", fiscalPeriodIds.join());
        fiscalPeriods.orderBy("start_date_time");
        fiscalPeriods.query();
        while(fiscalPeriods.next()) {
            fiscalPeriodsArray.push({
                sys_id: fiscalPeriods.getValue("sys_id"),
                name: fiscalPeriods.getValue("name"),
                start_date_time: fiscalPeriods.getValue("fiscal_start_date_time"),
                end_date_time: fiscalPeriods.getValue("fiscal_end_date_time")
            })
        }
        //gs.info("return fiscalPeriodsForIds: " + (new JSON()).encode(fiscalPeriodsArray));
        return fiscalPeriodsArray;
    },

    fiscalPeriodsWithinDateRange: function(startDate, endDate) {
        //gs.info("Into fiscalPeriodsWithinDateRange - startDate: " + startDate + " - endDate: " + endDate);
        var fiscalPeriodsArray = [];
        if(JSUtil.notNil(startDate) && JSUtil.notNil(endDate)) {
            var fiscalPeriods = new GlideRecord("fiscal_period");
            fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_type", "month"); // Take it from fiscal unit
            fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_start_date_time", ">=", startDate.getValue());
            fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_end_date_time", "<=", endDate.getValue());
            fiscalPeriods.orderBy("start_date_time");
            fiscalPeriods.query();
            //gs.info("fiscalPeriodsWithinDateRange query: " + fiscalPeriods.getEncodedQuery());
            while(fiscalPeriods.next()) {
                fiscalPeriodsArray.push({
                    sys_id: fiscalPeriods.getValue("sys_id"),
                    name: fiscalPeriods.getValue("name"),
                    start_date_time: fiscalPeriods.getValue("fiscal_start_date_time"),
                    end_date_time: fiscalPeriods.getValue("fiscal_end_date_time")
                })
            }
        }
        //gs.info("return fiscalPeriodsWithinDateRange: " + (new JSON()).encode(fiscalPeriodsArray));
        return fiscalPeriodsArray;
    },

    getFiscalPeriodForDate: function(date) {
        //gs.info("Into getFiscalPeriodForDate - date: " + date);
        if(JSUtil.notNil(date)) {
            // var fiscalYear = PPMFiscalPeriod.getFiscalYearForDate(date);
            var fiscalPeriods = new GlideRecord("fiscal_period");
            // fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_year", fiscalYear.getValue("sys_id"));
            fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_type", "month"); // Take it from fiscal unit
            fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_start_date_time", "<=", date);
            fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_end_date_time", ">=", date);
            fiscalPeriods.orderBy("start_date_time");
            fiscalPeriods.query();
            //gs.info("getFiscalPeriodForDate query: " + fiscalPeriods.getEncodedQuery());
            if(fiscalPeriods.next()) {
                //gs.info("getFiscalPeriodForDate period: " + fiscalPeriods.getValue("name"));
                return fiscalPeriods;
            }
        }
    },

    breakdownRecords: function(sysId, fiscalPeriodSysIds) {
        //gs.info("Into breakdownRecords: " + sysId);
        var budgetValues = {};
        var gr = new GlideRecord("cost_plan_breakdown");
        gr.addQuery("breakdown_type", "task");
        gr.addQuery("task", sysId);
        if(JSUtil.notNil(fiscalPeriodSysIds))
            gr.addQuery("fiscal_period", "IN", fiscalPeriodSysIds.join(","));
        gr.query();
        //gs.info("breakdownRecords Count: " + gr.getRowCount() + " -- " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
        return gr;
    },

    getData: function(budgetActualValues, fiscalPeriodId) {
        var budgetActual =  {budget: 0, actual: 0};
        if(JSUtil.notNil(budgetActualValues) && JSUtil.notNil(fiscalPeriodId)) {
            for (var i = 0; i < budgetActualValues.length; i++) {
                if(fiscalPeriodId == budgetActualValues[i].fiscal_period) {
                    // entries for capex and opex
                    budgetActual.budget = parseFloat(budgetActual.budget) + parseFloat(budgetActualValues[i].budget);
                    budgetActual.actual = parseFloat(budgetActual.actual) + parseFloat(budgetActualValues[i].actual);
                } 
            }
        }
        return budgetActual;
    },

    budgetVsActual: function(sysId) { // Cost Budget Vs Actual
        //gs.info("Into budgetVsActual: " + sysId);
        var arrayUtil = new ArrayUtil();
        var budgetActualValues = [];
        var fiscalPeriodSysIds = [];
        var gr = this.breakdownRecords(sysId);
        while(gr.next()) {
            var fiscalPeriodId = gr.getValue("fiscal_period");
            budgetActualValues.push({
                budget: gr.getValue("cost_default_currency"),
                expense_type: gr.getValue("expense_type"),
                actual: gr.getValue("actual"),
                fiscal_period: fiscalPeriodId
            });
            if(!arrayUtil.contains(fiscalPeriodSysIds, fiscalPeriodId))
                fiscalPeriodSysIds.push(fiscalPeriodId);
        }

        //gs.info("fiscalPeriodSysIds: " + fiscalPeriodSysIds.join(","));
        
        var fiscalPeriods = this.fiscalPeriodsForIds(fiscalPeriodSysIds);
        var xAxis = [];
        var leastStartDate, highestEndDate;
        for (var i = 0; i < fiscalPeriods.length; i++) {
            if(JSUtil.nil(leastStartDate)) {
                leastStartDate = new GlideDateTime(fiscalPeriods[i].start_date_time);
            } else {
                var startDate = new GlideDateTime(fiscalPeriods[i].start_date_time);
                if(startDate.compareTo(leastStartDate) < 0)
                    leastStartDate = startDate;
            }
            if(JSUtil.nil(highestEndDate)) {
                highestEndDate = new GlideDateTime(fiscalPeriods[i].end_date_time);
            } else {
                var endDate = new GlideDateTime(fiscalPeriods[i].end_date_time);
                if(endDate.compareTo(highestEndDate) > 0)
                    highestEndDate = endDate;
            }
        }

        var fiscalPeriods = this.fiscalPeriodsWithinDateRange(leastStartDate, highestEndDate);

        var budgetData = [];
        var actualData = [];
        for (var i = 0; i < fiscalPeriods.length; i++) {
            xAxis.push(fiscalPeriods[i].name);
            var budgetActualValue = this.getData(budgetActualValues, fiscalPeriods[i].sys_id)
            budgetData.push(budgetActualValue.budget);
            actualData.push(budgetActualValue.actual);
        }
        // Prepare the Chart Options
        var chartOptions = { 
            xAxis: { categories: xAxis },
            series: [{
                        data: budgetData,
                        name: 'Planned'
                    }, {
                        data: actualData,
                        name: 'Actual'
                    }],
            yAxis_title: gs.getMessage("$")
            };
        return chartOptions;
    },

    actualVsAllocated: function(sysId) { // Resource Actual Vs Allocated
        //gs.info("Into actualVsAllocated: " + sysId);
        var leastStartDate, highestEndDate;
        var gr = this.resourcePlans(sysId);
        while(gr.next()) {
            if(JSUtil.nil(leastStartDate)) {
                leastStartDate = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("start_date"));
            } else {
                var startDate = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("start_date"));
                if(startDate.compareTo(leastStartDate) < 0)
                    leastStartDate = startDate;
            }
            if(JSUtil.nil(highestEndDate)) {
                highestEndDate = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("end_date"));
            } else {
                var endDate = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("end_date"));
                if(endDate.compareTo(highestEndDate) > 0)
                    highestEndDate = endDate;
            }
        }
        if(JSUtil.notNil(leastStartDate)) {
            var fiscalPeriodRecord = this.getFiscalPeriodForDate(leastStartDate);
            if(JSUtil.notNil(fiscalPeriodRecord) && fiscalPeriodRecord.isValidRecord())
                leastStartDate = new GlideDateTime(fiscalPeriodRecord.getValue("fiscal_start_date_time"));
        }
        if(JSUtil.notNil(highestEndDate)) {
            var fiscalPeriodRecord = this.getFiscalPeriodForDate(highestEndDate);
            if(JSUtil.notNil(fiscalPeriodRecord) && fiscalPeriodRecord.isValidRecord())
                highestEndDate = new GlideDateTime(fiscalPeriodRecord.getValue("fiscal_end_date_time"));
        }
        var fiscalPeriods = this.fiscalPeriodsWithinDateRange(leastStartDate, highestEndDate);
        var xAxis = [], actualData = [], allocatedData = [];
        for (var i = 0; i < fiscalPeriods.length; i++) {
            xAxis.push(fiscalPeriods[i].name);
            var resourceData = this.actualVsAllocatedHours(sysId, fiscalPeriods[i]);
            actualData.push(resourceData.actual);
            allocatedData.push(resourceData.allocated);
        }
        // Prepare the Chart Options
        var chartOptions = { 
            xAxis: { categories: xAxis },
            series: [{
                        data: allocatedData,
                        name: 'Allocated'
                    },
					{
                        data: actualData,
                        name: 'Actual'
                    }],
            yAxis_title: gs.getMessage("Hours")
        };
        return chartOptions;
    },

    resourcePlans: function(topTaskId) {
        //gs.info("resourcePlans: " + topTaskId);
        var gr = new GlideRecord("resource_plan");
        gr.addQuery("top_task", topTaskId);
        gr.orderBy("start_date");
        gr.query();
        //gs.info("resourcePlans query: " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
        return gr;
    },

    getExecutiveSummary: function(projectStatusId) {
        //gs.info("getExecutiveSummary: " + projectStatusId);
        var statusRecord = this.getProjectStatusBySysId(projectStatusId);
        return this.overallStatus(statusRecord);
    },

    getOtherSummary: function(projectStatusId) {
        //gs.info("getOtherSummary: " + projectStatusId);
        var statusRecord = this.getProjectStatusBySysId(projectStatusId);
        return this.otherStatusSummary(statusRecord);
    },

    getVariance: function(startDate, workStart) {
        //gs.info("Into getVariance: " + startDate + " - " + workStart);
        var variance;
        var start = new GlideDateTime(startDate);
        var work = new GlideDateTime();
        if(JSUtil.notNil(workStart)) {
            work = new GlideDateTime(workStart);
        } 
        variance = GlideDateTime.subtract(start, work);
        var value = "";
        if(work.compareTo(start) > 0 && (work.getDate().getValue() != start.getDate().getValue())) {
            value = variance.getDayPart() + " Days";
        }
        return {
            value: value,
            show_icon: JSUtil.notNil(value)
        };
    },

    getTasksByQuery: function(projectSysId, queryString) {
        //gs.info("Into getTasksByQuery: " + projectSysId + " - " + queryString);
        var fields_array = [ gs.getMessage("Short Description"), gs.getMessage("Planned Start Date"), 
                        gs.getMessage("Actual Start Date"), gs.getMessage("Variance")];
        var tasks = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord("planned_task");
        gr.addEncodedQuery(queryString);
        gr.orderBy("start_date");
        gr.query();
        //gs.info("getTasksByQuery Count: " + gr.getRowCount() + " - " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
        while(gr.next()) {
            var variance = this.getVariance(gr.getValue("start_date"), gr.getValue("work_start"));
            tasks.push({
                short_description: gr.getValue("short_description"),
                start_date: gr.getDisplayValue("start_date"),
                work_start: gr.getDisplayValue("work_start"),
                variance: variance.value,
                variance_show_icon: variance.show_icon
            });
        }
        var response = {
            fields_array: fields_array,
            tasks: tasks
        };
        //gs.info("getTasksByQuery: " + (new JSON()).encode(response));
        return response;
    },

    actualVsAllocatedHours: function(projectSysId, fiscalPeriod) {
      //gs.info("Into actualVsAllocatedHours: " + projectSysId + " - " + fiscalPeriod.sys_id);
      var metrics = {};
      metrics.actual = 0;
      metrics.allocated = 0;
      var refCol = 'resource_plan.top_task';
      //gs.info("refCol: " + refCol);
      var gr = new GlideAggregate('resource_allocation');
      gr.addQuery(refCol, projectSysId);
      gr.addQuery('start_date', '>=', fiscalPeriod.start_date_time);
      gr.addQuery('start_date', '<=', fiscalPeriod.end_date_time);
      gr.addQuery('booking_type', 1);
      gr.addAggregate('SUM', 'allocated_hours');
      gr.setGroup(false);
      gr.query();
      //gs.info("resource_allocation Query: " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
      if (gr.next()) {
        var allocated = gr.getAggregate('SUM', 'allocated_hours');
        if (!gs.nil(allocated))
          metrics.allocated = parseFloat(allocated);
      }

      var timeCard = new GlideAggregate('time_card');
      // Time card as top task column -- Check with Pradeep.
      timeCard.addAggregate('SUM', 'total');
      timeCard.addQuery('week_starts_on', '>=', fiscalPeriod.start_date_time);
      timeCard.addQuery('week_starts_on', '<=', fiscalPeriod.end_date_time);
      timeCard.addQuery('state', 'Processed');
      timeCard.setGroup(false);
      var taskSubQuery = timeCard.addJoinQuery('planned_task', 'task', 'sys_id');
      taskSubQuery.addCondition('top_task', projectSysId);
      timeCard.query();
      //gs.info("time_card Query: " + timeCard.getEncodedQuery());
      if (timeCard.next()) {
        var totalHours = timeCard.getAggregate('SUM', 'total');
        if (!gs.nil(totalHours))
          metrics.actual = parseFloat(totalHours);
      }
      //gs.info("metrics: " + (new JSON()).encode(metrics));
      return metrics;
    },

    type: 'PmProjectStatusReport'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-31 21:27:09</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>9e75b5e09f331200598a5bb0657fcf19</sys_id><sys_mod_count>110</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PmProjectStatusReport</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Planned Task_v2" source="com.snc.planned_task_v2">3c7db62c0f5b130061981d2be1050e03</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9e75b5e09f331200598a5bb0657fcf19</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dan.gruber</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-08 20:22:12</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_0210b025db40e300db3459b2ca961957
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ProgramReportHelper</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ProgramReportHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var ProgramReportHelper = Class.create();
ProgramReportHelper.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	json: function () {
		return new JSON();
	},
	
	programStatus: function (sysId) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord("u_program_status_report");
		gr.addQuery("u_program", sysId);
		gr.orderByDesc("u_status_date");
		gr.query();
		gr.next();
		return gr;
	},
	
	statusReport: function (entity, entityId, fiscalYearSysId) {
		var categories = [];
		var statusReportInfo = {
		};
		categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Overall'), name: 'overall'});
			categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Schedule'), name: 'schedule'});
				categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Cost'), name: 'cost'});
					categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Resources'), name: 'resources'});
						categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Scope'), name: 'scope'});
							var data = [];
							var gr = new GlideRecord('u_program_status_report');
							gr.addQuery('u_program', entityId);
		                    gr.orderByDesc('u_status_date') 
							gr.setLimit(1);
							gr.query();
							if(gr.next()) {
								statusReportInfo = {
									sysId: gr.sys_id.toString(),
									name: gr.u_program.getDisplayValue()
								};
								data.push({ sys_id: gr.getValue('sys_id'),
									name: gr.getValue('u_number'),										   
									overall: gr.getValue('u_overall_health') || 'red',
									schedule: gr.getValue('u_schedule') || 'red',
									cost: gr.getValue('u_cost') || 'red',
									resources: gr.getValue('u_resource') || 'red',
									scope: gr.getValue('u_scope') || 'red',
									overall_comments: gr.getValue('u_overall_health_comments'),
									schedule_comments: gr.getValue('u_comments_on_schedule'),
									cost_comments: gr.getValue('u_comments_on_cost'),
									resources_comments: gr.getValue('u_comments_on_resources'),
									scope_comments: gr.getValue('u_comments_on_scope')
								});
							}
							
							var response = { 
								categories: categories,
								data: data,
								srInfo: statusReportInfo
							};
							return response;
						},
						
						type: 'ProgramReportHelper'

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_page"><sp_page action="DELETE"><css>.margin5 {
  margin-top: 5px;
}
.modern-dot {
    margin-right: 6px;
    width: 8px;
    height: 8px;
    display: inline-block;
    /*vertical-align: middle;*/
    border-radius: 100%;
    vertical-align: baseline;
    margin-left: 5px;
}
.tabs2_tab {
    border: 1px solid #bdc0c4;
	border-top: 3px solid #bdc0c4;
    border-right-width: 0;
    background-color: #e6e8ea;
    color: #343d47;
	border-top-left-radius: 3px; 
    border-top-right-radius: 3px; 
}
.tabs2_active {
    /*background-color: #ffffff;*/
    border-bottom: transparent;
    border-top-color: #278efc;
    font-weight: 500;
}
h4{
 font-size:20px !important;
 margin-bottom: 20px;
 /*margin-top: 10px;*/
}
body {
  /*background-color: #fff;*/
}
.bold{
 font-weight: bolder; 
}
.lighter{
 font-weight: lighter; 
}
@media print{
  .highcharts-root{
     width:450px !important;
     height: 300px !important;
  }
  .fa-check-circle:before {
       color: #5cb85c !important;
  }
  .fa-minus-circle:before {
    color: #f0ad4e !important;
  }
  .fa-exclamation-circle:before {
    color: #BB0000 !important;
  } 
}</css><draft>false</draft><id>copy_of_project_status_report_1</id><internal>false</internal><public>false</public><roles/><short_description>Project Status Report</short_description><sys_class_name>sp_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dan.gruber</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-17 19:26:29</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>f4be96a8db086300db3459b2ca9619e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>copy_of_project_status_report_1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_page_f4be96a8db086300db3459b2ca9619e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dan.gruber</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-17 19:26:29</sys_updated_on><title>Copy of Project Status Report (1)</title></sp_page></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.PgProgramStatusReport</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Status Report API</description><name>PgProgramStatusReport</name><script><![CDATA[var PgProgramStatusReport = Class.create();
PgProgramStatusReport.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	programRecord: function(sysId, programTable) {
		var gr;
		if(JSUtil.notNil(programTable)) {
			gr = new GlideRecord(programTable); // for Teamspaces
		} else {
			gr = new GlideRecord("pm_program");
		}
		gr.get(sysId);
		return gr;
	},
	
	getIcon: function(value) {
		var retVal = null;
		switch (value) {
			case 'green':
			retVal = "fa-check-circle";
			break;
			case 'on_schedule':
			retVal = "fa-check-circle";
			break;
			case 'complete':
			retVal = "fa-check-circle";
			break;
			case 'yellow':
			retVal = "fa-minus-circle";
			break;
			case 'at_risk':
			retVal = "fa-minus-circle";
			break;
			default:
            retVal = "fa-exclamation-circle";
		}
		
		return retVal;
	},
	
	headerInfoPlain: function(sysId) {
		//gs.info("Into headerInfo: " + sysId);
		var gr = new GlideRecord("u_program_status_report");
		gr.get(sysId);
		// var gr = this.programRecord(sysId);
		return {
			short_description: gr.u_program.short_description.getValue(),
			description: gr.u_program.description.getValue(),
			number: gr.u_progra.number.getValue(),
			program_manager_label: gs.getMessage("Program Manager"),
			program_manager_value: gr.u_program.program_manager.getDisplayValue(),
			portfolio_label: gs.getMessage("Portfolio"),
			portfolio_value: gr.u_program.portfolio.getDisplayValue(),
			start_date_label: gs.getMessage("Planned Start Date"),
			start_date_value: gr.u_program.start_date.getDisplayValue(),
			work_start_label: gs.getMessage("Actual Start Date"),
			work_start_value: gr.u_program.work_start.getDisplayValue(),
			work_end_exists: JSUtil.notNil(gr.getValue("work_end")),
			work_end_label: gs.getMessage("Actual End Date"),
			work_end_value: gr.u_program.work_end.getDisplayValue(),
			end_date_label: gs.getMessage("Planned End Date"),
			end_date_value: gr.u_program.end_date.getDisplayValue(),
			percent_complete_label: gs.getMessage("% Complete"),
			percent_complete_value: gr.u_program.percent_complete.getDisplayValue(),
			state_label: gs.getMessage("State"),
			state_value: gr.u_program.state.getDisplayValue(),
			current_status_label: gs.getMessage("Current Status"),
			current_status_value: gr.u_current_status.getDisplayValue(),
			recent_activity_label: gs.getMessage("Recent Activity"),
			recent_activity_value: gr.u_recent_activity.getDisplayValue(),
			this_week_label: gs.getMessage("This Week"),
			this_week_value: gr.u_this_week.getDisplayValue(),
			looking_ahead_label: gs.getMessage("Looking Ahead"),
			looking_ahead_value: gr.u_looking_ahead.getDisplayValue(),
			overall_health_label: gs.getMessage("Overall Health"),
			overall_health_value: gr.u_overall_health_comments.getDisplayValue(),
			comments_on_cost_label: gs.getMessage("Comments on Cost"),
			comments_on_cost_value: gr.u_comments_on_cost.getDisplayValue(),
			comments_on_resource_label: gs.getMessage("Comments on Resource"),
			comments_on_resource_value: gr.u_comments_on_resource.getDisplayValue(),
			comments_on_schedule_label: gs.getMessage("Comments on Schedule"),
			comments_on_schedule_value: gr.u_comments_on_schedule.getDisplayValue(),
			comments_on_scope_label: gs.getMessage("Comments on Scope"),
			comments_on_scope_value: gr.u_comments_on_scope.getDisplayValue()
		};
	},
	
	allProgramStatus: function(sysId) {
		var programStatus = [];
		var gr = new GlideRecord("u_program_status_report");
		gr.addQuery("u_program", sysId);
		gr.orderByDesc("u_status_date");
		gr.query();
		//gs.info("statusRecordCount: " + gr.getRowCount() + " -- " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
		while(gr.next()) {
			programStatus.push({
				sys_id: gr.getValue("sys_id"),
				label: gr.getDisplayValue("u_status_date"),
				value: gr.getValue("u_status_date"),
				selected: false
			});
		}
		if(programStatus.length > 0) {
			programStatus[0].selected = true;
		} else {
			programStatus.push({
				sys_id: -1,
				label: gs.getMessage("None"),
				value: "none",
				selected: true
			});
		}
		return programStatus;
	},
	
	weeksInfo: function(sysId) {
		//gs.info("Into weeksInfo: " + sysId);
		var gr = this.programRecord(sysId);
		var startDate = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("start_date"));
		var endDate = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("end_date"));
		var startWeek = startDate.getWeekOfYearLocalTime();
		var endWeek = endDate.getWeekOfYearLocalTime();
		var weeks = [];
		for (var i = startWeek; i <= endWeek; i++) {
			weeks.push({
				number: i,
				name: gs.getMessage("Week {0}", i),
					selected: (i==startWeek)
				});
			}
			return {
				name: gr.getValue("short_description"),
				start_date: startDate.getDisplayValue(),
				end_date: endDate.getDisplayValue(),
				start_week: startWeek,
				end_week: endWeek,
				weeks: weeks
			};
		},
		
		statusInfo: function(sysId) {
			//gs.info("Into weeksInfo: " + sysId);
			var gr = this.programRecord(sysId);
			var allProgramStatus = this.allProgramStatus(sysId);
			return {
				name: gr.getValue("short_description"),
				choices: allProgramStatus,
				init_value: allProgramStatus[0].value
			};
		},
		
		otherStatus: function(statusRecord) {
			//gs.info("Into overallStatus: " + statusRecord.getValue("sys_id"));
			return this.otherStatusSummary(statusRecord);
		},
		
		otherStatusSummary: function(gr) {
			var otherStatus = [];
			otherStatus.push({
				order: 1,
				label: gs.getMessage("Overall"),
				value: gr.getDisplayValue("u_overall_health"),
				internal_value: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_overall_health")),
				comments: gr.getValue("u_overall_health_comments"),
				icon: this.getIcon(gr.getValue("u_overall_health"))
			});
			otherStatus.push({
				order: 2,
				label: gs.getMessage("Schedule"),
				value: gr.getDisplayValue("u_schedule"),
				internal_value: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_schedule")),
				comments: gr.getValue("u_comments_on_schedule"),
				icon: this.getIcon(gr.getValue("u_schedule"))
			});
			otherStatus.push({
				order: 3,
				label: gs.getMessage("Cost"),
				value: gr.getDisplayValue("u_cost"),
				internal_value: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_cost")),
				comments: gr.getValue("u_comments_on_cost"),
				icon: this.getIcon(gr.getValue("u_cost"))
			});
			otherStatus.push({
				order: 4,
				label: gs.getMessage("Resources"),
				value: gr.getDisplayValue("u_resource"),
				internal_value: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_resource")),
				comments: gr.getValue("u_comments_on_resources"),
				icon: this.getIcon(gr.getValue("u_resource"))
			});
			otherStatus.push({
				order: 5,
				label: gs.getMessage("Scope"),
				value: gr.getDisplayValue("u_scope"),
				internal_value: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_scope")),
				comments: gr.getValue("u_comments_on_scope"),
				icon: this.getIcon(gr.getValue("u_scope"))
			});
			return { displayFields: otherStatus };
			},
			
			programStatusByReportName: function(reportName, sysId, weekDate) {
				var allStatus = [];
				var gr = this.getProgramStatusReport(sysId, weekDate);
				return this[reportName](gr);
			},
			
			getProgramStatusReport: function(sysId, weekDate) {
				var gr = new GlideRecord("u_program_status_report");
				gr.get(sysId);
				
				return gr;
			},
			
			statusByReportName: function(reportName, sysId, weekDate) {
				var allStatus = [];
				var gr = this.getProgramStatus(sysId, weekDate);
				return this[reportName](gr);
			},
			
			getProgramStatus: function(sysId, weekDate) {
				var gr = new GlideRecord("u_program_status_report");
				gr.get(sysId);
				if(JSUtil.notNil(weekDate))
					gr.addQuery("u_status_date", "<=", weekDate);
				else
					gr.addQuery("u_status_date", "<=", (new GlideDateTime()).getValue());
				gr.orderByDesc("u_status_date");
				gr.query();
				//gs.info("statusRecordCount: " + gr.getRowCount() + " -- " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
				if(gr.next()) {
					return gr;
				}
			},
			
			getProgramStatusBySysId: function(sysId) {
				var gr = new GlideRecord("u_program_status_report");
				gr.get(sysId);
				return gr;
			},
			
			overallStatus: function(statusRecord) {
				//gs.info("Into overallStatus: " + statusRecord.getValue("sys_id"));
				var overallStatus = {
					label: gs.getMessage("Overall Status"),
					displayFields: []
				};
				if(JSUtil.notNil(statusRecord) && statusRecord.isValidRecord()) {
					overallStatus.displayFields.push({
						order: 1,
						label: gs.getMessage("Current Status"),
						value: statusRecord.getValue("u_current_status")
					});
					overallStatus.displayFields.push({
						order: 2,
						label: gs.getMessage("Recent Activities"),
						value: statusRecord.getValue("u_recent_activity")
					});
					overallStatus.displayFields.push({
						order: 3,
						label: gs.getMessage("Looking Ahead"),
						value: statusRecord.getValue("u_looking_ahead")
					});
					overallStatus.displayFields.push({
						order: 4,
						label: gs.getMessage("This Week"),
						value: statusRecord.getValue("u_this_week")
					});
					/*overallStatus.displayFields.push({
						order: 4,
						label: gs.getMessage("Status"),
						value: statusRecord.getDisplayValue("overall_health"),
						internal_value: statusRecord.getValue("overall_health")
					});*/
				}
				return overallStatus;
			},
			
			getColorValue: function(colorValue) {
				if(JSUtil.nil(colorValue))
					return "white";
				return colorValue;
			},
			
			getWeekValue: function(dateValue) {
				var date = new GlideDateTime(dateValue);
				var week = date.getWeekOfYearLocalTime();
				return week;
			},
			
			statusValues: function(sysId, startDate, endDate) {
				//gs.info("Into statusValues: " + sysId);
				var statusValues = {};
					var programGr = this.programRecord(sysId);
					var gr = new GlideRecord("u_program_status_report");
					gr.addQuery("u_program", sysId);
					if(JSUtil.notNil(startDate))
						gr.addQuery("u_status_date", ">=", startDate);
					if(JSUtil.notNil(endDate))
						gr.addQuery("u_status_date", "<=", endDate);
					else
						gr.addQuery("u_status_date", "<=", (new GlideDateTime()).getValue());
					gr.query();
					//gs.info("statusRecordCount: " + gr.getRowCount() + " -- " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
					while(gr.next()) {
						var week = this.getWeekValue(gr.getValue("u_status_date"));
						statusValues[week] = {  overall:  this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_overall_health")),
							schedule: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_schedule")),
							cost: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_cost")),
							resources: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_resource")),
							scope: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_scope")),
						};
					}
					//gs.info("statusValues: " + (new JSON()).encode(statusValues));
					return statusValues;
				},
	
				getStatuses: function(srId, endDate, limit) {
					
					// Get Program ID
					var programId = null;
					var grPID = new GlideRecord('u_program_status_report');
					if(grPID.get(srId)) {
						programId = grPID.u_program;
					}
					var programStatus = [], orderedStatus = [];
					var gr = new GlideRecord("u_program_status_report");
					gr.addQuery("u_program", programId);
					//if(JSUtil.notNil(endDate))
						//gr.addQuery("u_status_date", "<=", endDate);
				//	else
						//gr.addQuery("u_status_date", "<=", (new GlideDateTime()).getValue());
					gr.setLimit(limit);
					gr.orderByDesc("u_status_date");
					gr.query();
					while(gr.next()) {
						programStatus.push({overall:  this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_overall_health")),
							comments: gr.getValue("u_overall_health_comments"),
							schedule: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_schedule")),
							schedule_comments: gr.getValue("u_comments_on_schedule"),
							cost: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_cost")),
							cost_comments: gr.getValue("u_comments_on_cost"),
							resources: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_resource")),
							resources_comments: gr.getValue("u_comments_on_resources"),
							scope: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_scope")),
							scope_comments: gr.getValue("u_comments_on_scope"),
							date: gr.getValue("u_status_date")
						});
					}
					return programStatus;
				},	
				
/*				getStatuses: function(programId, endDate, limit) {
					
					// Get Program ID
					var grPID = new GlideRecord('u_program_status_report');
					if(grPID.get(prog))
					var programStatus = [], orderedStatus = [];

					gr.addQuery("u_program", programId);
					if(JSUtil.notNil(endDate))
						gr.addQuery("u_status_date", "<=", endDate);
					else
						gr.addQuery("u_status_date", "<=", (new GlideDateTime()).getValue());
					gr.setLimit(limit);
					gr.orderByDesc("u_status_date");
					gr.query();
					//gs.info("statusRecordCount: " + gr.getRowCount() + " -- " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
					while(gr.next()) {
						programStatus.push({overall:  this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_overall_health")),
							comments: gr.getValue("u_overall_health_comments"),

							cost_comments: gr.getValue("u_comments_on_cost"),
							resources: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_resources")),
							resources_comments: gr.getValue("u_comments_on_resources"),
							scope: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_scope")),

				getStatusesFromLastReport: function(lastReportId, limit) {
					//gs.info("Into getStatusesFromLastReport: " + lastReportId + " -- " + limit);
					var lastProgramStatus = this.getProgramStatusBySysId(lastReportId);
					var programtId = lastProgramStatus.getValue("u_program");
					var endDate = lastProgramStatus.getValue("u_status_date");
					var programStatus = [];
					var gr = new GlideRecord("u_program_status_report");
					gr.addQuery("u_program", programId);
					if(JSUtil.notNil(endDate))
						gr.addQuery("u_status_date", "<=", endDate);
					else
						gr.addQuery("u_status_date", "<=", (new GlideDateTime()).getValue());
					gr.setLimit(limit || 10);
					gr.orderBy("u_status_date");
					gr.query();
					//gs.info("statusRecordCount: " + gr.getRowCount() + " -- " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
					while(gr.next()) {
						programStatus.push({overall:  this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_overall_health")),
							schedule: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_schedule")),
							cost: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_cost")),
							resources: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_resource")),
							scope: this.getColorValue(gr.getValue("u_scope")),
							date: gr.getValue("u_status_date")
						});
					}
					return programStatus;
				},
				
				statusReport: function(sysId, startDate, endDate) {
					//gs.info("Into statusReport: " + sysId);
					var statusReport = {};
						// high chart plots on the based on the index of the category
						statusReport['yAxis'] = {
							categories: [ gs.getMessage('Scope'), gs.getMessage('Resource'),
							gs.getMessage('Cost'),  gs.getMessage('Schedule'),
							gs.getMessage('Overall')
							],
							title: null
						};
						
						var weeksInfo = this.weeksInfo(sysId);
						var startWeek = weeksInfo.start_week;
						var weeks = weeksInfo.weeks;
						var statusValues = this.statusValues(sysId, startDate, endDate);
						var xAxisCategories = [];
						for (var i = 0; i < weeks.length; i++) {
							xAxisCategories.push(weeks[i].name);
						}
						
						statusReport['xAxis'] = {
							categories: xAxisCategories
						}
						
						// now re-map the start week to zero index
						var data = [];
						for (var i = 0; i < weeks.length; i++) {
							var week = weeks[i].number;
							var statusValue = statusValues[week];
							var valueArray = ['scope', 'resources', 'cost', 'schedule', 'overall'];
							for (var j = 0; j < valueArray.length; j++) {
								var color = "white";
								if(JSUtil.notNil(statusValue))
									color = statusValue[valueArray[j]];
								data.push({
									x: i,
									y: j,
									color: color
								});
							}
						}
						statusReport['data'] = data;
						return statusReport;
					},
					
					fiscalPeriodsForIds: function(fiscalPeriodIds) {
						//gs.info("Into fiscalPeriodsForIds: " + fiscalPeriodIds.join(','));
						var fiscalPeriodsArray = [];
						var fiscalPeriods = new GlideRecord("fiscal_period");
						fiscalPeriods.addQuery("sys_id", "IN", fiscalPeriodIds.join());
						fiscalPeriods.orderBy("start_date_time");
						fiscalPeriods.query();
						while(fiscalPeriods.next()) {
							fiscalPeriodsArray.push({
								sys_id: fiscalPeriods.getValue("sys_id"),
								name: fiscalPeriods.getValue("name"),
								start_date_time: fiscalPeriods.getValue("fiscal_start_date_time"),
								end_date_time: fiscalPeriods.getValue("fiscal_end_date_time")
							})
						}
						//gs.info("return fiscalPeriodsForIds: " + (new JSON()).encode(fiscalPeriodsArray));
						return fiscalPeriodsArray;
					},
					
					fiscalPeriodsWithinDateRange: function(startDate, endDate) {
						//gs.info("Into fiscalPeriodsWithinDateRange - startDate: " + startDate + " - endDate: " + endDate);
						var fiscalPeriodsArray = [];
						if(JSUtil.notNil(startDate) && JSUtil.notNil(endDate)) {
							var fiscalPeriods = new GlideRecord("fiscal_period");
							fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_type", "month"); // Take it from fiscal unit
							fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_start_date_time", ">=", startDate.getValue());
							fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_end_date_time", "<=", endDate.getValue());
							fiscalPeriods.orderBy("start_date_time");
							fiscalPeriods.query();
							//gs.info("fiscalPeriodsWithinDateRange query: " + fiscalPeriods.getEncodedQuery());
							while(fiscalPeriods.next()) {
								fiscalPeriodsArray.push({
									sys_id: fiscalPeriods.getValue("sys_id"),
									name: fiscalPeriods.getValue("name"),
									start_date_time: fiscalPeriods.getValue("fiscal_start_date_time"),
									end_date_time: fiscalPeriods.getValue("fiscal_end_date_time")
								})
							}
						}
						//gs.info("return fiscalPeriodsWithinDateRange: " + (new JSON()).encode(fiscalPeriodsArray));
						return fiscalPeriodsArray;
					},
					
					getFiscalPeriodForDate: function(date) {
						//gs.info("Into getFiscalPeriodForDate - date: " + date);
						if(JSUtil.notNil(date)) {
							// var fiscalYear = PPMFiscalPeriod.getFiscalYearForDate(date);
							var fiscalPeriods = new GlideRecord("fiscal_period");
							// fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_year", fiscalYear.getValue("sys_id"));
							fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_type", "month"); // Take it from fiscal unit
							fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_start_date_time", "<=", date);
							fiscalPeriods.addQuery("fiscal_end_date_time", ">=", date);
							fiscalPeriods.orderBy("start_date_time");
							fiscalPeriods.query();
							//gs.info("getFiscalPeriodForDate query: " + fiscalPeriods.getEncodedQuery());
							if(fiscalPeriods.next()) {
								//gs.info("getFiscalPeriodForDate period: " + fiscalPeriods.getValue("name"));
								return fiscalPeriods;
							}
						}
					},
					
					breakdownRecords: function(sysId, fiscalPeriodSysIds) {
						//gs.info("Into breakdownRecords: " + sysId);
						var budgetValues = {};
							var gr = new GlideRecord("cost_plan_breakdown");
							gr.addQuery("breakdown_type", "task");
							gr.addQuery("task", sysId);
							if(JSUtil.notNil(fiscalPeriodSysIds))
								gr.addQuery("fiscal_period", "IN", fiscalPeriodSysIds.join(","));
							gr.query();
							//gs.info("breakdownRecords Count: " + gr.getRowCount() + " -- " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
							return gr;
						},
						
						getData: function(budgetActualValues, fiscalPeriodId) {
							var budgetActual =  {budget: 0, actual: 0};
								if(JSUtil.notNil(budgetActualValues) && JSUtil.notNil(fiscalPeriodId)) {
									for (var i = 0; i < budgetActualValues.length; i++) {
										if(fiscalPeriodId == budgetActualValues[i].fiscal_period) {
											// entries for capex and opex
											budgetActual.budget = parseFloat(budgetActual.budget) + parseFloat(budgetActualValues[i].budget);
											budgetActual.actual = parseFloat(budgetActual.actual) + parseFloat(budgetActualValues[i].actual);
										}
									}
								}
								return budgetActual;
							},
							
							budgetVsActual: function(sysId) { // Cost Budget Vs Actual
								//gs.info("Into budgetVsActual: " + sysId);
								var arrayUtil = new ArrayUtil();
								var budgetActualValues = [];
								var fiscalPeriodSysIds = [];
								var gr = this.breakdownRecords(sysId);
								while(gr.next()) {
									var fiscalPeriodId = gr.getValue("fiscal_period");
									budgetActualValues.push({
										budget: gr.getValue("cost_default_currency"),
										expense_type: gr.getValue("expense_type"),
										actual: gr.getValue("actual"),
										fiscal_period: fiscalPeriodId
									});
									if(!arrayUtil.contains(fiscalPeriodSysIds, fiscalPeriodId))
										fiscalPeriodSysIds.push(fiscalPeriodId);
								}
								
								//gs.info("fiscalPeriodSysIds: " + fiscalPeriodSysIds.join(","));
								
								var fiscalPeriods = this.fiscalPeriodsForIds(fiscalPeriodSysIds);
								var xAxis = [];
								var leastStartDate, highestEndDate;
								for (var i = 0; i < fiscalPeriods.length; i++) {
									if(JSUtil.nil(leastStartDate)) {
										leastStartDate = new GlideDateTime(fiscalPeriods[i].start_date_time);
									} else {
										var startDate = new GlideDateTime(fiscalPeriods[i].start_date_time);
										if(startDate.compareTo(leastStartDate) < 0)
											leastStartDate = startDate;
									}
									if(JSUtil.nil(highestEndDate)) {
										highestEndDate = new GlideDateTime(fiscalPeriods[i].end_date_time);
									} else {
										var endDate = new GlideDateTime(fiscalPeriods[i].end_date_time);
										if(endDate.compareTo(highestEndDate) > 0)
											highestEndDate = endDate;
									}
								}
								
								var fiscalPeriods = this.fiscalPeriodsWithinDateRange(leastStartDate, highestEndDate);
								
								var budgetData = [];
								var actualData = [];
								for (var i = 0; i < fiscalPeriods.length; i++) {
									xAxis.push(fiscalPeriods[i].name);
									var budgetActualValue = this.getData(budgetActualValues, fiscalPeriods[i].sys_id)
									budgetData.push(budgetActualValue.budget);
									actualData.push(budgetActualValue.actual);
								}
								// Prepare the Chart Options
								var chartOptions = {
									xAxis: { categories: xAxis },
										series: [{
											data: budgetData,
											name: 'Planned'
										}, {
											data: actualData,
											name: 'Actual'
										}],
										yAxis_title: gs.getMessage("$")
									};
									return chartOptions;
								},
								
								actualVsAllocated: function(sysId) { // Resource Actual Vs Allocated
									//gs.info("Into actualVsAllocated: " + sysId);
									var leastStartDate, highestEndDate;
									var gr = this.resourcePlans(sysId);
									while(gr.next()) {
										if(JSUtil.nil(leastStartDate)) {
											leastStartDate = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("start_date"));
										} else {
											var startDate = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("start_date"));
											if(startDate.compareTo(leastStartDate) < 0)
												leastStartDate = startDate;
										}
										if(JSUtil.nil(highestEndDate)) {
											highestEndDate = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("end_date"));
										} else {
											var endDate = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("end_date"));
											if(endDate.compareTo(highestEndDate) > 0)
												highestEndDate = endDate;
										}
									}
									if(JSUtil.notNil(leastStartDate)) {
										var fiscalPeriodRecord = this.getFiscalPeriodForDate(leastStartDate);
										if(JSUtil.notNil(fiscalPeriodRecord) && fiscalPeriodRecord.isValidRecord())
											leastStartDate = new GlideDateTime(fiscalPeriodRecord.getValue("fiscal_start_date_time"));
									}
									if(JSUtil.notNil(highestEndDate)) {
										var fiscalPeriodRecord = this.getFiscalPeriodForDate(highestEndDate);
										if(JSUtil.notNil(fiscalPeriodRecord) && fiscalPeriodRecord.isValidRecord())
											highestEndDate = new GlideDateTime(fiscalPeriodRecord.getValue("fiscal_end_date_time"));
									}
									var fiscalPeriods = this.fiscalPeriodsWithinDateRange(leastStartDate, highestEndDate);
									var xAxis = [], actualData = [], allocatedData = [];
									for (var i = 0; i < fiscalPeriods.length; i++) {
										xAxis.push(fiscalPeriods[i].name);
										var resourceData = this.actualVsAllocatedHours(sysId, fiscalPeriods[i]);
										actualData.push(resourceData.actual);
										allocatedData.push(resourceData.allocated);
									}
									// Prepare the Chart Options
									var chartOptions = {
										xAxis: { categories: xAxis },
											series: [{
												data: allocatedData,
												name: 'Allocated'
											},
											{
												data: actualData,
												name: 'Actual'
											}],
											yAxis_title: gs.getMessage("Hours")
										};
										return chartOptions;
									},
									
									resourcePlans: function(topTaskId) {
										//gs.info("resourcePlans: " + topTaskId);
										var gr = new GlideRecord("resource_plan");
										gr.addQuery("top_task", topTaskId);
										gr.orderBy("start_date");
										gr.query();
										//gs.info("resourcePlans query: " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
										return gr;
									},
									
									getExecutiveSummary: function(programStatusId) {
										//gs.info("getExecutiveSummary: " + programStatusId);
										var statusRecord = this.getProgramStatusBySysId(programStatusId);
										return this.overallStatus(statusRecord);
									},
									
									getOtherSummary: function(programStatusId) {
										//gs.info("getOtherSummary: " + programStatusId);
										var statusRecord = this.getProgramStatusBySysId(programStatusId);
										return this.otherStatusSummary(statusRecord);
									},
									
									getVariance: function(startDate, workStart) {
										//gs.info("Into getVariance: " + startDate + " - " + workStart);
										var variance;
										var start = new GlideDateTime(startDate);
										var work = new GlideDateTime();
										if(JSUtil.notNil(workStart)) {
											work = new GlideDateTime(workStart);
										}
										variance = GlideDateTime.subtract(start, work);
										var value = "";
										if(work.compareTo(start) > 0 && (work.getDate().getValue() != start.getDate().getValue())) {
											value = variance.getDayPart() + " Days";
										}
										return {
											value: value,
											show_icon: JSUtil.notNil(value)
										};
									},
									
									getTasksByQuery: function(programSysId, queryString) {
										//gs.info("Into getTasksByQuery: " + programSysId + " - " + queryString);
										var fields_array = [ gs.getMessage("Short Description"), gs.getMessage("Planned Start Date"),
										gs.getMessage("Actual Start Date"), gs.getMessage("Variance")];
										var tasks = [];
										var gr = new GlideRecord("planned_task");
										gr.addEncodedQuery(queryString);
										gr.orderBy("start_date");
										gr.query();
										//gs.info("getTasksByQuery Count: " + gr.getRowCount() + " - " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
										while(gr.next()) {
											var variance = this.getVariance(gr.getValue("start_date"), gr.getValue("work_start"));
											tasks.push({
												short_description: gr.getValue("short_description"),
												start_date: gr.getDisplayValue("start_date"),
												work_start: gr.getDisplayValue("work_start"),
												variance: variance.value,
												variance_show_icon: variance.show_icon
											});
										}
										var response = {
											fields_array: fields_array,
											tasks: tasks
										};
										//gs.info("getTasksByQuery: " + (new JSON()).encode(response));
										return response;
									},
									
									actualVsAllocatedHours: function(programSysId, fiscalPeriod) {
										//gs.info("Into actualVsAllocatedHours: " + programSysId + " - " + fiscalPeriod.sys_id);
										var metrics = {};
											metrics.actual = 0;
											metrics.allocated = 0;
											var refCol = 'resource_plan.top_task';
											//gs.info("refCol: " + refCol);
											var gr = new GlideAggregate('resource_allocation');
											gr.addQuery(refCol, programSysId);
											gr.addQuery('start_date', '>=', fiscalPeriod.start_date_time);
											gr.addQuery('start_date', '<=', fiscalPeriod.end_date_time);
											gr.addQuery('booking_type', 1);
											gr.addAggregate('SUM', 'allocated_hours');
											gr.setGroup(false);
											gr.query();
											//gs.info("resource_allocation Query: " + gr.getEncodedQuery());
											if (gr.next()) {
												var allocated = gr.getAggregate('SUM', 'allocated_hours');
												if (!gs.nil(allocated))
													metrics.allocated = parseFloat(allocated);
											}
											
											var timeCard = new GlideAggregate('time_card');
											// Time card as top task column -- Check with Pradeep.
											timeCard.addAggregate('SUM', 'total');
											timeCard.addQuery('week_starts_on', '>=', fiscalPeriod.start_date_time);
											timeCard.addQuery('week_starts_on', '<=', fiscalPeriod.end_date_time);
											timeCard.addQuery('state', 'Processed');
											timeCard.setGroup(false);
											var taskSubQuery = timeCard.addJoinQuery('planned_task', 'task', 'sys_id');
											taskSubQuery.addCondition('top_task', programSysId);
											timeCard.query();
											//gs.info("time_card Query: " + timeCard.getEncodedQuery());
											if (timeCard.next()) {
												var totalHours = timeCard.getAggregate('SUM', 'total');
												if (!gs.nil(totalHours))
													metrics.actual = parseFloat(totalHours);
											}
											//gs.info("metrics: " + (new JSON()).encode(metrics));
											return metrics;
										},
										
										type: 'PgProgramStatusReport'
									};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dan.gruber</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-21 15:55:51</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>9ad4daf5dbc8e300db3459b2ca96196e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>40</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PgProgramStatusReport</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9ad4daf5dbc8e300db3459b2ca96196e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dan.gruber</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-27 16:47:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="u_status_date" table="u_program_status_report"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_page"><sp_page action="DELETE"><css>.margin5 {
  margin-top: 5px;
}
.modern-dot {
    margin-right: 6px;
    width: 8px;
    height: 8px;
    display: inline-block;
    /*vertical-align: middle;*/
    border-radius: 100%;
    vertical-align: baseline;
    margin-left: 5px;
}
.tabs2_tab {
    border: 1px solid #bdc0c4;
	border-top: 3px solid #bdc0c4;
    border-right-width: 0;
    background-color: #e6e8ea;
    color: #343d47;
	border-top-left-radius: 3px; 
    border-top-right-radius: 3px; 
}
.tabs2_active {
    /*background-color: #ffffff;*/
    border-bottom: transparent;
    border-top-color: #278efc;
    font-weight: 500;
}
h4{
 font-size:20px !important;
 margin-bottom: 20px;
 /*margin-top: 10px;*/
}
body {
  /*background-color: #fff;*/
}
.bold{
 font-weight: bolder; 
}
.lighter{
 font-weight: lighter; 
}
@media print{
  .highcharts-root{
     width:450px !important;
     height: 300px !important;
  }
  .fa-check-circle:before {
       color: #5cb85c !important;
  }
  .fa-minus-circle:before {
    color: #f0ad4e !important;
  }
  .fa-exclamation-circle:before {
    color: #BB0000 !important;
  } 
}</css><draft>false</draft><id>copy_of_project_status_report_2</id><internal>false</internal><public>false</public><roles/><short_description>Project Status Report</short_description><sys_class_name>sp_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dan.gruber</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-17 19:29:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>925f5ae8db086300db3459b2ca961992</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>copy_of_project_status_report_2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_page_925f5ae8db086300db3459b2ca961992</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dan.gruber</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-17 19:30:57</sys_updated_on><title>HHS Program Status Report</title></sp_page></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_page_04bec635dbc8e300db3459b2ca96194a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_page"><sp_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>.margin5 {
  margin-top: 5px;
}
.modern-dot {
    margin-right: 6px;
    width: 8px;
    height: 8px;
    display: inline-block;
    /*vertical-align: middle;*/
    border-radius: 100%;
    vertical-align: baseline;
    margin-left: 5px;
}
.tabs2_tab {
    border: 1px solid #bdc0c4;
	border-top: 3px solid #bdc0c4;
    border-right-width: 0;
    background-color: #e6e8ea;
    color: #343d47;
	border-top-left-radius: 3px; 
    border-top-right-radius: 3px; 
}
.tabs2_active {
    /*background-color: #ffffff;*/
    border-bottom: transparent;
    border-top-color: #278efc;
    font-weight: 500;
}
h4{
 font-size:20px !important;
 margin-bottom: 20px;
 /*margin-top: 10px;*/
}
body {
  /*background-color: #fff;*/
}
.bold{
 font-weight: bolder; 
}
.lighter{
 font-weight: lighter; 
}
@media print{
  .highcharts-root{
     width:450px !important;
     height: 300px !important;
  }
  .fa-check-circle:before {
       color: #5cb85c !important;
  }
  .fa-minus-circle:before {
    color: #f0ad4e !important;
  }
  .fa-exclamation-circle:before {
    color: #BB0000 !important;
  } 
}</css><draft>false</draft><id>program_status_report</id><internal>false</internal><public>false</public><roles/><short_description>Program Status Report</short_description><sys_class_name>sp_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dan.gruber</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-21 15:28:56</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>04bec635dbc8e300db3459b2ca96194a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>program_status_report</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_page_04bec635dbc8e300db3459b2ca96194a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dan.gruber</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-21 15:30:15</sys_updated_on><title>Program Status Report</title></sp_page></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_0210b025db40e300db3459b2ca961957
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ProgramReportHelper</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ProgramReportHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var ProgramReportHelper = Class.create();
ProgramReportHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    json: function () {
        return new JSON();
    },

    programStatus: function (sysId) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord("u_program_status_report");
        gr.addQuery("u_program", sysId);
        gr.orderByDesc("u_status_date");
        gr.query();
        gr.next();
        return gr;
    },

    statusReport: function (entity, entityId, fiscalYearSysId) {
        var categories = [];
        categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Overall'), name: 'overall'});
        categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Schedule'), name: 'schedule'});
        categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Cost'), name: 'cost'});
        categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Resources'), name: 'resources'});
        categories.push({label: gs.getMessage('Scope'), name: 'scope'});
        var data = [];
        var fundingRecs;
        if(entity == 'portfolio') {
            fundingRecs = (new PPMProjectFunding()).findAllTasksInBudgetPlan('portfolio', entityId, fiscalYearSysId, undefined, true);
        } else {
            var gr = new GlideRecord('pm_program');
            gr.get(entityId);
            fundingRecs = (new Program(gr)).projects(fiscalYearSysId);
        }
        while(fundingRecs.next()) {
            var taskGr;
            if ( entity == 'portfolio' )
                taskGr = fundingRecs.task.getRefRecord();
            else
                taskGr = fundingRecs;
            if(taskGr.instanceOf('pm_program')) {
                var programId = taskGr.getValue('sys_id');
                var programStatusGr = this.programStatus(programId);
                data.push({ sys_id: taskGr.getValue('sys_id'),
                            name: taskGr.getValue('short_description'),
                            overall: programStatusGr.getValue('u_overall_health') || 'red',
                            schedule: programStatusGr.getValue('u_schedule') || 'red',
                            cost: programStatusGr.getValue('u_cost') || 'red',
                            resources: programStatusGr.getValue('u_resources') || 'red',
                            scope: programStatusGr.getValue('u_scope') || 'red',
                            overall_comments: programStatusGr.getValue('u_overall_health_comments'),
                            schedule_comments: programStatusGr.getValue('u_comments_on_schedule'),
                            cost_comments: programStatusGr.getValue('u_comments_on_cost'),
                            resources_comments: programStatusGr.getValue('u_comments_on_resources'),
                            scope_comments: programStatusGr.getValue('u_comments_on_scope')
                        });
            }
        }
        var response = { categories: categories,
                 data: data 
                };
        return response;
    },

    type: 'ProgramReportHelper'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dan.gruber</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-20 13:57:10</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>0210b025db40e300db3459b2ca961957</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ProgramReportHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0210b025db40e300db3459b2ca961957</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dan.gruber</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-20 19:21:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_f2207d419f0112000ad25c96132e708b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ProjectStatusColorHelper</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Functions to assist with work on g_forms.- works with changing the Style background</description><name>ProjectStatusColorHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var ProjectStatusColorHelper = Class.create();
ProjectStatusColorHelper.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	setStatusColor: function() {
		var value = this.getParameter("sysparm_value");
		var color = "";
		
		gs.log("value = " + value);
		
		// Choose the color based on incoming value
		if(value == "late" || value == 'red')
			color = "tomato";
		else if(value == "at_risk" || value == 'yellow')
			color = "yellow";
		else if(value == "on_schedule" || value == 'green')
			color = "lightgreen";
		else if(value == "complete")
			color ="SkyBlue";
		
		return color;
	}
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-17 17:28:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>f2207d419f0112000ad25c96132e708b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ProjectStatusColorHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">f07db62c0f5b130061981d2be1050e03</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f2207d419f0112000ad25c96132e708b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dan.gruber</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-17 15:22:56</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
